name: graphite-web-frontend
author: Graphite Authors <contact@graphite.art>
browserslist: > 1.5%, last 2 versions, not dead, not ie 11, not op_mini all, not ios_saf < 13

scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run wasm:build-dev && concurrently -k -n "VITE,RUST" "vite" "npm run wasm:watch-dev"
scripts.profiling: npm run setup && npm run wasm:build-profiling && concurrently -k -n "VITE,RUST" "vite" "npm run wasm:watch-profiling"
scripts.production: npm run setup && npm run wasm:build-production && concurrently -k -n "VITE,RUST" "vite" "npm run wasm:watch-production"
scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run wasm:build-production && vite build
scripts.build-dev: npm run setup && npm run wasm:build-dev && vite build --mode dev
scripts.build-profiling: npm run setup && npm run wasm:build-profiling && vite build --mode dev
scripts.build-native: npm run setup && npm run native:build-production
scripts.build-native-dev: npm run setup && npm run native:build-dev
scripts.native:build-dev: wasm-pack build ./wasm --dev --target=web --no-default-features --features native && vite build --mode dev
